question: Manu Charitam was composed by
explanation: The famous Telugu poet Allasani Peddana composed Swaarochisha Manu Sambhavam (also known as Manu Charitram). He was in the group of eight poets in the court of Krishnadevaraya, a ruler of the Vijayanagara Empire. The book, Manu Charitram, is a development of an episode in the Markandeya Purana relating to the birth of Svarochishamanu, who is one of the fourteen Manus.
